statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 16 \\ -14 \\ 20 \\ -8 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 26 \\ -22 \\ 32 \\ -14 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 36 \\ -24 \\ 40 \\ -28 \\ -20 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
